smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.SufficientEvidenceOfClaim: " The student will use reasoning, evaluation, and evidence to assess the credibility of multiple sources in order to select relevant information to support research."
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: " The student will use reasoning, evaluation, and evidence to assess the credibility of multiple sources in order to select relevant information to support research."
